title: It's late, but there's still talent among free agents
subtitle: It's late, but there's still talent among free agents
body: A month before the portending equipment trucks roll toward Florida and Arizona, nearly a hundred ballplayers do not yet know what their own destinations will be.  They are the free agents remaining on a market about to mobilize with the urgency of approaching Spring Training.  Not yet -- the big current shadow is cast by salary arbitration, with clubs eager to sign players with whom they will otherwise exchange figures on Tuesday. Tom Singer is a national reporter for MLB.com. Follow @Tom_Singer on Twitter. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Tom Singer
